channel.title: 317 RSPS coding help
channel.description: I have recently tried to make a 317 rsps. so far everything has gone smoothly i hav learned how to change and add npc's and things of that nature. the past couple days i have been editing and creating shops but for some reason whenever i click on an npc the shop inventory pops up. in other words nothing happens. i dont know if this is a problem with my client or what PLZZZZ HELLPP!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Any help at all is welcome!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: 317 RSPS coding help
item.dc:creator: @albertelli10 albertelli10
item.description:
@albertelli10 wrote:

woooowww i feel like an idiot i didn’t no i was supposed to click trade hahahaha thanx
[size=14pt]I am a programming n00b!!![/size]
is ther a way i can change it so that u can also click “talk to shop keeper” to open up the store inventory?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 RSPS coding help
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Probably have to add a case for that npc. Or maybe you aren’t clicking trade.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 RSPS coding help
item.dc:creator: @albertelli10 albertelli10
item.description:
@albertelli10 wrote:

what i want to happen is when i click on say a shop keeper i want that shop keeper’s shop inventory to pop up. for example in real runescape when you go to the general store and u click on the shop keeper their his inventory comes up and you can buy and sell things there. currently on the server i am working on nothing happens when i clik on that shop keeper.

Read full topic

What? I think I could help you with this but I’m unclear of what you mean by that statement underlined.
